title: VCs weigh in on Europe's future in the critical deep tech market - TechCrunch
content: VCs weigh in on Europe's future in the critical deep tech market  TechCrunch
description: We discussed deep tech with Cottonwood Technology Fund's Michael Jackson, Outsized Ventures' Isabel Fox, Amadeus Capital Partners' Nick Kingsbury and Andrea Traversone, and XAnge's Cyril Bertrand.
